item.title: The Women Who Built Grunge
item.description: This week the “Sunday Morning Reading Award” goes to Lisa Whittington-Hill, for her The Women Who Built Grunge on Longreads: Bands like L7 and Heavens to Betsy were instrumental to the birth of the grunge scene, but for decades were treated like novelties and sex objects. Thirty years later, itâ€™s time to reassess their legacy. More here. Subscribe to the newsletter, the RSS feed, or follow @nicolaiarocci on Twitter
